SummaryEnglish: DC Heroes United features an all-new storyline with weekly decisions that audiences will make to impact the future of Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman and more. The story sets the Justice League at year zero, meaning fans will have an opportunity to shake up the team from the very beginning. How the Justice League forms, the relationships between the characters – and in some cases, who survives – is all up to the audience.

1.SummaryEnglish: The Tower of Fate crashes into Gotham City and as the city descends into chaos, a new group of heroes emerge, hoping to restore order.

2.SummaryEnglish: An old friend helps the heroes learn more about the Tower of Fate's secrets.

3.SummaryEnglish: A new friend joins the fight to stop evil from securing the power of Fate.

4.SummaryEnglish: As the power of darkness grows stronger, our heroes search for an artifact that may change their Fates. Lois and Clark face a pivotal moment.

5.SummaryEnglish: Circe makes Barbara Minerva an enticing offer as the heroes scramble to enact a plan to rescue her.

6.SummaryEnglish: Wonder Woman struggles to cope with a deep betrayal. Doctor Fate entrusts the heroes with a crucial mission.
